transcript.title: APEC Leaders and Minister Meetings - Vancouver
transcript.content:

ACCREDITATION
As for previous years, the accreditatiohi process starts well in advance. Freelancers will also need to attach aÂ letter of assignment.

ACCOMMODATION
The High Commission in Canada has booked 35 rooms in the hotel where the ministers andÂ Prime Minister are staying ( the Rennaissance). The room rate varies from $218 ( city views) toÂ S241 ( harbour views). This hotel is likely to be the venue for Australian press conferences andÂ will also house a modest media centre. The rooms will be allocated on a " first in, first served"Â basis. If you wish to book reserved room please complete the attached accommodationÂ request form and return it with your accreditation ( and tick "will not require hotel reservation"Â in the accommodation section of the application).

Could you also please ensure this information is passed ASAP to non gallery-based media inÂ your group likely to be seeking accreditation.
